content: Yeah, I think renting an RV could be a great idea. I've heard that the scenic drive from Flagstaff to the Grand Canyon is really beautiful, and having an RV would allow us to take our time and enjoy the views. We could even camp overnight at the Grand Canyon and wake up to the sunrise. Do you think it's possible to reserve a campsite with electric hookups at the Grand Canyon, or would we need to rough it?
